import { useState, useContext } from "react"; import "./cart.css"; import { context } from "../context/CartContextProvider"; const FormCart = ({ checkOut }) => { const { removeAllProducts } = useContext(context); const [personalData, setPersonalData] = useState({ nombre: "", apellido: "", mail: "", }); const handleInputChange = (event) => { setPersonalData({ ...personalData, [event.target.name]: event.target.value, }); }; const finish = () => { checkOut(personalData); removeAllProducts(); }; return (

Payment Details

); }; export default FormCart; {/*

Datos de facturación

*/}
